segments.text: Hello ! nice to see you here at the finest centre again . What exercises are you going to do today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to do some jogging on the treadmill . Then I think I'll do some work with the dumbbless .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . I'd suggest you do some crunches too . Thery're great for getting in shape . Make sure you do them correctly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I will . Could you help me with the treadmill ? I found it difficult to get the setting right last time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Is today only you second visit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . I'll be coming here regularly . I think I need regular exercise to get in shape and then to stay in shape .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The treadmill is excellent for helping you to build up stamina . Each time you use it , increase this distance . don't worry about your speed at first . You can increase that later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was told that the first time I came heer . I was told not to put too much pressure on my body at first . I need to build up slowly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . You don't want to injure yourself by exercising too much or in the wrong way . Now , this is how you make the settings for the treadmill ...
segments.speaker: S1
